Static Public Member Functions

static RefCountedFloatBuffer allocate (const DD::Image::Box &bounds, int nComps, int pixelStep, int rowStep, int componentStep, size_t alignment=0)
 allocate some new memory for a buffer, optionally align memory (also rounds up allocated amount to multiple of alignment)
 

Detailed Description

Provides a reference counted float buffer. Has a pointer to the actual underlying buffer for the purpose of reference counting and also an offset which can be manipulated by pointer arithmetic.
